greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (eta(q^2)^2 * eta(q^9) * eta(q^18)) / (eta(q) * eta(q^6)) in powers of q.
comment: Cubic AGM theta functions: a(q) (see A004016), b(q) (A005928), c(q) (A005882).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(2^e) = 1, a(3^e) = 0^e, a(p^e) = e+1 if p == 1 (mod 6), a(p^e) = (1 + (-1)^e)/2 if p == 5 (mod 6).
Expansion of (c(q) + c(q^2))/3 in powers of q^(1/3) where c(q) is a cubic AGM theta function.
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, 0, If[ Mod[n, 3] == 0, 0, DivisorSum[ n, KroneckerSymbol[ -12, #] &]]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jul 30 2015 *)
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ x QPochhammer[ x^9]^3 / QPochhammer[ x^3] + x^2 QPochhammer[ x^18]^3 / QPochhammer[ x^6], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jul 30 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, if( n%3, sumdiv(n,d, kronecker(-12, d))))};
(PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, direuler(p=2, n, if( p==3, 1, 1 / ((1 - X) * (1 - kronecker(-12, p)*X))))[n])}:
(PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<1, 0, n--; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^2 + A)^2 * eta(x^9 + A) * eta(x^18 + A) / (eta(x + A) * eta(x^6 + A)), n))};
(PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<1, 0, n--; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^9 + A)^3 / eta(x^3 + A) + x * eta(x^18 + A)^3 / eta(x^6 + A), n))};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Nov 02 2005
